contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox language |name=Douala |states=[[Cameroon]] |ethnicity=[[Duala people|Duala]], [[Mungo people|Mungo]] |speakers=90,000 |date=1982 |ref=e17 |familycolor=Niger-Congo |fam2=[[Atlantic–Congo languages|Atlantic–Congo]] |fam3=[[Benue–Congo languages|Benue–Congo]] |fam4=[[Bantoid languages|Bantoid]] |fam5=[[Bantu languages|Bantu]] ([[Guthrie classification of Bantu languages#Zone A|Zone A]]) |fam6=[[Sawabantu languages|Sawabantu]] (A.20) |dia1=Bodiman |dia2=Mongo (Muungo) |dia3=Oli (Ewodi, Wuri) |dia4=Pongo |iso2=dua |iso3=dua |guthrie=A.24–26 |dia1=Duala proper |dia2=Bodiman |dia3=Oli |dia4=Pongo |dia5=Mongo }} '''Duala''' (also spelled '''Douala''', '''Diwala''', '''Dwela''', '''Dualla''', and '''Dwala''') is a [[dialect cluster]] spoken by the [[Duala people|Duala]] and [[Mungo people]]s of [[Cameroon]]. The song "[[Soul Makossa]]", as well as pop songs that repeated its lyrics, internationally popularized the Duala word for "(I) dance", "makossa".[http://www.inst.at/trans/13Nr/echu13.htm] The song [[Alane (song)|Alane]] by artist [[Wes Madiko]] is sung in Duala and reached #1 position in over 9 European countries. Duala belongs to the [[Bantu languages|Bantu language family]], in a subgroup called [[Sawabantu languages|Sawabantu]]. Maho (2009) treats Duala as a cluster of five languages: Duala proper, Bodiman, Oli (Ewodi, Wuri), Pongo, and Mongo. == Dictionaries == # E. Dinkelacker, ''Wörterbuch der Duala-Sprache,'' [[Hamburg]], 1914. # Paul Helmlinger, ''Dictionnaire duala-français, suivi d'un lexique français-duala.'' Editions Klincksieck, [[Paris]], 1972. # [[Johannes Ittmann]], edited by E. Kähler-Meyer, ''Wörterbuch der Duala-Sprache, Dictionnaire de la langue duala, Dictionary of the Duala Language,'' Dietrich Reimer, [[Berlin]], 1976. The preface evaluates ref. 1 above as terse, but good, while ref. 2 has missing and erroneous tone marks. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.omniglot.com/writing/duala.php Duala alphabet], Omniglot * [http://www.studentsoftheworld.info/sites/divers/584.php DUALA SUN : language and culture] * [http://duala.kazeo.com/lexique-duala-%28byalati%29/lexique-duala-%28byalati%29,r84555.html Ya Jokwa Duala] (short dictionary of the French – Duala) * [http://philippe.litou.free.fr/duala/langue_duala.htm la langue Duala] * [[:fr:wikt:Catégorie:douala|Witkionnaire, français–duala]] * [http://www.bantu-languages.com/fr/ Bantulanyi] * [http://www.ethnologue.com/show_language.asp?code=dua Ethnologue entry] * [http://llmap.org/languages/dua.html Map of Duala language from the LL-Map project] * [http://www.jesusfilm.org/film-and-media/watch-the-film Christian films in Douala] (video) * [http://fr.dooh.org Portail Douala-douala] (not function) [[Category:Languages of Cameroon]] [[Category:Sawabantu languages]] {{Cameroon-stub}} {{Bantu-lang-stub}}
